text:
In this tutorial, you discovered a framework that you can use to quickly understand and frame
your time series forecasting problem. Speciﬁcally, you learned:
 A structured way of thinking about time series forecasting problems.
 A framework to uncover the characteristics of a given time series forecasting problem.
 A suite of speciﬁc questions, the answers to which will help to deﬁne your forecasting
problem.
